responses.rationale: Expresses positive sentiment about a future possibility ('encouraged about tuberculosis') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes potential negative impacts, not capabilities, preparedness, or future possibilities.
Describes past events and predictions, not current capabilities or preparedness.
Describes a current low-risk fact ('extremely rare'), not capabilities or preparedness.
Describes a hopeful future possibility ('resolve itself very quickly') from industry PR without explicit calming keywords.
Describes past response measures ('quickly reined in and stamped out') implying capability without explicit calming keywords.
Describes a hopeful future possibility ('resolve itself very quickly') and underlying capability ('new pullets coming into production') from industry PR without explicit calming keywords.
Describes a hopeful future possibility ('we will be able to eliminate this') contingent on conditions without explicit calming keywords.
